mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, nickname, email_address, user_status) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{emailAddress}, ${1})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, phone, head_url, user_description, email_address, user_status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted FROM user WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update:
UPDATE user
head_url = #{headUrl},
user_description = #{userDescription},
WHERE id = #{id};
